select * from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, b.* from (select @rownum:=0) as tmp, tb1_board as b
where title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
where content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
where title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
where writer like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
order by bno desc ) as pagingboard where rownum>(#{pageNum}-1)*#{inAmount} and rownum<=#{pageNum}*#{inAmount};
mapper.update: update tb1_board set title=#{title},content=#{content}, visit=#{visit}+1 where bno=#{bno};
